title: The Haunting of Mia Moss
overview: Upon returning to her childhood hometown Mia Moss (Nicola Fiore) begins experiencing disturbing nightmares and episodes of sleep paralysis; the phenomenon in which a person wakes up after entering deep sleep and finds that although they are fully awake their body is not.. Leaving them essentially paralyzed.. It's in these moments that a group of shadow beings begin pursuing her.
